page.title: 18RELIGION
page.content: There are eight chapels and churches in our block. The represent most denominations with only two being of the same denomination. The main difference we have found between the one church in the block and the chapels is that the church holds a weekly communion service and chapels hold such a service once a month. A local{tradition}we have found within the chapels is annual Eisteddfod. Each chapel competes against the rest in singing, literary and craft competitions. This plays a major part in the social life of the local chapels.Almost all the religious services held within the churches and chapels in the block are held through the medium of{Welsh.}Most religious establishments also hold weekly social group meetings e.g. Sisterhood.
